description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Fly into outer space in order to defend your planet from destruction!  But, beware. In this four-sided celestial brawl, everyone is fighting for their own survival.  Be the last planet standing by bouncing the onslaught of oncoming comets into your neighbors.  When the mushroom-clouds settle, only the vicious and the quick will remain!
